ai-patthana12.8:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.8:1.1_0: It’s not easy to give a teaching for the complete ending of suffering.
ai-patthana12.8:2.1_0: it’s not easy to teach to teach Dhamma to an ascetic,
ai-patthana12.8:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana12.8:4.1_0: I won’t give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana12.8:4.1_2: Neither causes and reasons: five produces the objects of conditions,
ai-patthana12.8:5.1_1: nor does he give rise to the north,
ai-patthana12.8:5.1_2: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana12.8:5.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana12.8:6.1_0: I won’t be able to teach Dhamma to anyone who understands, nor can I allow them to examine the Teaching, or to teach them.
